column3: all night i've been staring can you tell i want you can't be too wide open there's nothing i won't do oh just thought you should know   that's when you start to laugh saying i just want what i can't have won't even give me a chance claiming i'm just not as serious as you shorty if you only knew this is serious   i wish i wasn't famous i wish i was still in school so that i could have you in my dorm room i would put it on you crazy   that's when you start to laugh saying i just want what i can't have won't even give me a chance claiming i'm just not as serious as you shorty if you only knew this is serious   up all night up all night up all night up all night up all night up all night up all night
